items.label: def-single-particle-marginal
items.title: Single-Particle Marginal
items.content:
176: :label: def-single-particle-marginal
177: 
178: The single-particle marginal of $\pi_N$ is:
179: 
180: $$
181: \mu_N(A) := \pi_N(\{(w_1, \ldots, w_N) : w_1 \in A\})
182: $$
items.raw_directive:
173: ### A1.1.3 Single-Particle Marginal
174: 
175: :::{prf:definition} Single-Particle Marginal
176: :label: def-single-particle-marginal
177: 
178: The single-particle marginal of $\pi_N$ is:
179: 
180: $$
181: \mu_N(A) := \pi_N(\{(w_1, \ldots, w_N) : w_1 \in A\})
182: $$
183:
